subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Joe Calzaghe added Mikkel Kessler’s W.B.A. and W.B.C. supermiddleweight titles to his own W.B.O. crown in Cardiff, Wales, outpointing the previously undefeated Kessler. Calzaghe is 44-0.
snippet: Joe Calzaghe added Mikkel Kessler’s W.B.A. and W.B.C. supermiddleweight titles to his own W.B.O. crown in Cardiff, Wales, outpointing the previously undefeated Kessler. Calzaghe is 44-0.
